sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM
IptvTestConfig WHERE
(Parameter == "Client VLAN Enabled" OR Parameter == "Client PPPoX Enabled")
AND Value == "True") > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

Children.Name: Run SQL Command: Store IPTV Results to Iteration .db

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL Command: Store IPTV Results to Iteration .db

sql_statement.static: SELECT (1 +

) as Iteration, avg(JoinLatency)*1e-3 as 'AvgJoinLatency', avg(LeaveLatency)*1e-3 as 'AvgLeaveLatency', sum(JoinFail) As 'JoinFail', sum(DuplicateJoin) as 'DuplicateJoin', sum(case when (JoinLatency*1e-3) >
then 1 else 0 end) as 'JoinLatencyOverThreshold', sum(case when (LeaveLatency*1e-3) >
then 1 else 0 end) as 'LeaveLatencyOverThreshold' FROM IgmpGroupMembershipResults
SELECT (1 +
) as Iteration, GroupAddr, HostAddr, JoinLatency*1e-3 as 'JoinLatency', LeaveLatency*1e-3 as 'LeaveLatency', JoinFail, DuplicateJoin FROM IgmpGroupMembershipResults

Properties.Value: Run SQL Command: Store IPTV Results to Summary .db

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, AvgJoinLatency, AvgLeaveLatency, JoinFail, DuplicateJoin, JoinLatencyOverThreshold, LeaveLatencyOverThreshold FROM IPTV_Iteration_Graph_Results
SELECT Iteration, GroupAddr, HostAddr, JoinLatency, LeaveLatency, JoinFail, DuplicateJoin FROM IPTV_Iteration_Results
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS IPTV_Realtime_Latency_Data (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, AvgJoinLatency, AvgLeaveLatency)
SELECT AvgJoinLatency, AvgLeaveLatency FROM IPTV_Iteration_Graph_Results

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

sql_statement.static: select Iteration, GroupAddr as 'Multicast Group Address',
HostAddr as 'Host Address', JoinFail as 'Join Failure Count',
as 'Join Fail Threshold' from IPTV_Iteration_Results where JoinFail !=

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

sql_statement.static: select Iteration, GroupAddr as 'Multicast Group Address',
HostAddr as 'Host Address', DuplicateJoin as 'Duplicate Join Count',
as 'Duplicate Join Threshold' from IPTV_Iteration_Results where DuplicateJoin !=

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All Join Latency results are within threshold value

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Join Latency result exceeded the threshold value

sql_statement.static: select Iteration, GroupAddr as 'Multicast Group Address',
HostAddr as 'Host Address', JoinLatency as 'Join Latency (ms)',
as 'Join Latency Threshold (ms)' from IPTV_Iteration_Results where JoinLatency >

HostAddr as 'Host Address', LeaveLatency as 'Leave Latency (ms)',
as 'Leave Latency Threshold (ms)' from IPTV_Iteration_Results where LeaveLatency >

WHERE (Parameter != "Client VLAN Enabled" AND Parameter != "Source VLAN Enabled" AND Parameter != "Client PPPoX Enabled")

Children.Name: Run SQL Command: Validate IPTV Results

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL Command: Validate IPTV Results

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, COUNT(DISTINCT GroupAddr) as 'Multicast Group Address Count',
COUNT(DISTINCT HostAddr) as 'Host Address Count', COUNT(JoinFail) as 'Join Failures Count',
as 'Join Fail Threshold' FROM IPTV_Results WHERE JoinFail !=
GROUP BY Iteration ORDER BY Iteration

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, COUNT(DISTINCT GroupAddr) as 'Multicast Group Address Count',
COUNT(DISTINCT HostAddr) as 'Host Address Count', COUNT(DuplicateJoin) as 'Duplicate Joins Count',
as 'Duplicate Join Threshold' FROM IPTV_Results WHERE DuplicateJoin !=
GROUP BY Iteration ORDER BY Iteration

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All Join Latency results are within threshold value

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Join Latency result exceeded the threshold value

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, COUNT(DISTINCT GroupAddr) as 'Multicast Group Address Count',
COUNT(DISTINCT HostAddr) as 'Host Address Count', COUNT(JoinLatency) as 'Exceeded Join Latency Count'
FROM IPTV_Results WHERE JoinLatency >
GROUP BY Iteration ORDER BY Iteration

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All Leave Latency results are within threshold value

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT name FROM sqlite_master

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Leave Latency result exceeded the threshold value

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, COUNT(DISTINCT GroupAddr) as 'Multicast Group Address Count',
COUNT(DISTINCT HostAddr) as 'Host Address Count', COUNT(LeaveLatency) as 'Exceeded Leave Latency Count'
FROM IPTV_Results WHERE LeaveLatency >
GROUP BY Iteration ORDER BY Iteration

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 1262
Frontend.EpDescription: Amount of time in milliseconds to wait for the first multicast packet after sending the IGMP join to consider the IGMP join a success (must be less than the Join Wait Time)

Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 1263
Frontend.EpDescription: Amount of time in milliseconds to wait for the last multicast packet after sending the IGMP leave to consider the IGMP leave a success (must be less than the Join Wait Time)
